column2: the order of the Provincial High Court is contrary to the

decision 
in  Somawathie  v  Wimalaratne  [2006]  B.L.J.
the Provincial High Court held that the acquittal of the

Appellant 
from 
the  charge  of  bigamy  was  due 
to
absence of mens rea and his second marriage also stands
the Provincial High Court erred in its failure to consider

in  one 
that
